articles.title: Meralco takes pivotal semis lead vs. Magnolia - pna.gov.ph
articles.description: MANILA – Meralco took a commanding 2-1 lead in its PBA Governors' Cup semifinal series against Magnolia with a 101-95 Game 3 on Sunday night at the Mall of Asia Arena in Pasay City.The Bolts endured a late comeback by the Hotshots to preserve a stellar third-…
articles.content:

articles.title: Riding the omicron variant waves: Health officials anticipate an increase in COVID-19 infections - The Republic
articles.description: Local health officials say they expect to see an increase in COVID-19 infections in the coming weeks as a more contagious version of the omicron variant that is already driving up cases in Europe and Asia makes its way across the United States.
articles.content: Local health officials say they expect to see an increase in COVID-19 infections in the coming weeks as a more contagious version of the omicron variant that is already driving up cases in Europe and… [+5636 chars]

articles.title: Ikhsan Fandi brace gives Lions win in front of record crowd; Malaysia coach finds it 'difficult to say' if Singapore deserves victory - AsiaOne

articles.title: Woman in UK is diagnosed with deadly Crimean-Congo haemorrhagic fever after travelling to Asia - Daily Mail
articles.description: A woman in the UK has been diagnosed with Crimean-Congo haemorrhagic fever after travelling to central Asia, the UK Health Security Agency said.
articles.content:
